title: Physicochemical, nutritional properties, and antioxidant potential of ‘limilla’ fruit (Rhus aromatica var. schmidelioides (Schltdl.) Engl.)
content:
Publication date: 15 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 15

Author(s): Gonzalo Soria-Melgarejo, Juan C. Raya-Pérez, Juan G. Ramírez-Pimentel, Jorge Covarrubias-Prieto, Glenda M. Gutiérrez-Benicio, Isaac Andrade-González, Cesar L. Aguirre-Mancilla
